title: Paterson Great Falls National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets must be restrained on a leash no longer than 6 feet (2 m). Pets should not be left unattended. Summer sunshine poses a threat to pets in vehicles. Pet owners are responsible for removing pet waste from picnic areas, parking lots, roads, and other developed areas.
